title: how to learn html
content: To learn Html, start with basics: install Html, create routes for web pages, and understand templates. Build small projects, like a simple blog or to-do list, to practice. Learn about database integration and user authentication. Follow tutorials, read documentation, and join forums for help. Experiment, make mistakes, and understand how things work. Gradually, tackle more advanced topics, like RESTful APIs. Practice regularly, and you'll gain confidence in web development with Html.
author: rana dhruv
